asset.author: breville

transcripts: This is the breville 5 quart diecast stand mixer it comes with 5 quart stainless steel bowl and handle and you just align it to the arrow and lock it into place and comes to the scraper beater . So what makes this attachment really unique , are the rubber edges on the beater and this eliminates the need for having to hand scrape the bowl end cuts the mixing time by up to 50% . The scraper is used for cream butter and sugar and  you might use this for a cake batter cookies or frosting. The flat beater is for normal or or heavy mixtures like mashed potatoes and biscuits . The wire is  used for adding air so if you're making egg whites or meringue or whipped cream . The dough hook would be you used for heavy mixtures bread or pizza dough. And all the accessories are really easy to go on. Just slide it on just like that . I also have this 2-piece pouring shield so you can add your ingredients without spilling them . It just goes on like this. So if you're adding your flower, it will just funnel straight in. And a lift assist handle at the front of for even improved usability . And of 550 degree base has an led speed indicator and it has 12 speed control dials . The lcd timer can time up to 10 minutes. So all these attachments and the ball are dishwasher safe , but the base needs to be wiped down with a damp cloth . The breville die-cast stand mixer . This innovation is built for baking.
